Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Spear, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 20/60ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Bullywug makes 2 melee attacks, one with its bite and one with its spear

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Bullywug can breath air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Speak with Frogs and Toads, The Bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frigs and toads
Abilities.Ability 3: Swamp Camouflage, The Bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain
Abilities.Ability 4: Standing Leap, The Bullywug's long jump is up to 20ft and its high jump is up to 10ft, with or without a running start
